com.delphix.masking.api.plugin.utils

Class ComponentCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.delphix.masking.api.plugin.utils.ComponentCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentWrapper.ComponentServiceBackend

    public class ComponentCache
extends java.lang.Object
implements ComponentWrapper.ComponentServiceBackend
    This class orchestrates component loading and caching of component objects. It also can scan all loaded plugins to discover all available frameworks and instances. In all cases, each plugin is visited only once -- to scan the same plugin again (perhaps because the JAR contents have changed), create another object of this class.

    • Method Detail

      • getOrCreatePluginLoader

        public PluginLoader getOrCreatePluginLoader(java.lang.String pluginName,
                                            java.lang.String pluginPath,
                                            boolean isBuiltIn)
        Create a new plugin loader and add it to the component cache. If a loader already exists for this plugin, it is reused.
        Parameters:
        pluginName - The name of the plugin
        pluginPath - The path to the plugin's JAR
        isBuiltIn - Whether the plugin is builtin
        Returns:
        The new or existing plugin loader

      • newInstance

        public void newInstance(java.lang.String instanceName,
                        ComponentWrapper.ComponentInstanceDetails details,
                        boolean update)
        Add the configuration for a component instance to the cache.
        Parameters:
        instanceName - The name of the component instance. This must be unique.
        details - The values specifying the type and configuration of the new instance.
        update - Whether this operation should update an existing component instance if one exists.

      • getInstanceNames

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getInstanceNames()

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • createComponentInstance

        public ComponentWrapper createComponentInstance(java.lang.String instanceName)
        This method creates an instance of an algorithm known to the cache.
        Parameters:
        instanceName - The name of the algorithm instance to create or return.
        Returns:
        The wrapped masking component

      • createComponentInstance

        public ComponentWrapper createComponentInstance(java.lang.String instanceName,
                                                boolean isTracked)
        This method creates an instance of an algorithm known to the cache.
        Parameters:
        instanceName - The name of the algorithm instance to create or return.
        isTracked - Whether the cache should track the component for cleanup
        Returns:
        The wrapped masking component

      • createRawComponentInstance

        public MaskingComponent createRawComponentInstance(java.lang.String pluginName,
                                                   java.lang.String pluginJarPath,
                                                   java.lang.String className,
                                                   boolean builtIn)
        Create an anonymous component instance of the specified class without configuring or calling setup. The details of this instance are not added to the internal cache or dependency graph.
        Parameters:
        pluginName - The name of the plugin that provides the framework class.
        pluginJarPath - The path to the plugin JAR file.
        className - The framework class of the component to create. The returned object will be of this class.
        builtIn - Whether the referenced plugin should be considered built-in.
        Returns:
        The raw component instance.

      • cleanup

        public void cleanup()
        Clean up all component instances know to the cache.

      • discoverFrameworks

        public java.util.Set<MaskingComponent> discoverFrameworks(java.lang.String pluginName)
        Discover all algorithm framework classes provided by a plugin.
        Parameters:
        pluginName - The name of the plugin.
        Returns:
        A set of objects for each class that is a component framework and implements the MaskingAlgorithm class.

      • discoverInstanceDetails

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,ComponentWrapper.ComponentInstanceDetails> discoverInstanceDetails(java.lang.String pluginName)
        Discover all algorithm component instances provided by a plugin.
        Parameters:
        pluginName - The name of the plugin from which the instances are to be constructed.
        Returns:
        A map of instance names to detailed component configuration objects.

      • loadInstances

        public void loadInstances(java.lang.String pluginName,
                          java.lang.String algoInstanceFile)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Read a file containing a set of algorithm instance descriptions and add each instance's configuration to the internal cache of instance configurations,
        Parameters:
        pluginName - The name of the plugin from which the instances are to be constructed.
        algoInstanceFile - The file containing algorithm instance descriptions.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When problems occur reading the instance file.

      • setRandomKey

        public void setRandomKey(boolean randomKey)
        Controls how the internal backend provider generates keys for algorithms. If true, a new key is computed randomly each time an algorithm instance is created. If false, each algorithm key is derived by hashing the algorithm's instance name, and will remain consistent so long as the algorithm has the same name.
        Parameters:
        randomKey - Whether algorithms keys are generated randomly.

      • knowsComponentInstance

        public boolean knowsComponentInstance(java.lang.String instanceName)
        Check whether a particular component instance name is known to the component cache.
        Parameters:
        instanceName - The name of to check
        Returns:
        Whether the cache has a component instance of the provided name
